parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to insert the revision table at the existing revision table anchor point, false to anchor the table at the point specified by X and Y

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the revision table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of this revision table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Shape
parameters.description: Revision symbol shape as defined in swRevisionTableSymbolShape_e

parameters.name: AutoUpdateZoomCells
parameters.description: True to automatically update zone cells, false to not

title: ISheet.InsertRevisionTable2
description: Inserts a revision table in this drawing sheet.
signature:
RevisionTableAnnotation InsertRevisionTable2( 
   System.Boolean
UseAnchorPoint
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Int32
AnchorType
,
   System.String
TableTemplate
,
   System.Int32
Shape
,
   System.Boolean
AutoUpdateZoomCells
)

parameters.name: UseAnchorPoint
parameters.description: True to insert the revision table at the existing revision table anchor point, false to anchor the table at the point specified by X and Y

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: X coordinate for the placement of the revision table annotation

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate for the placement of this revision table annotation

parameters.name: AnchorType
parameters.description: Anchor type as defined by swBOMConfigurationAnchorType_e

parameters.name: TableTemplate
parameters.description: Path and filename of the template that corresponds to this type of table (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Shape
parameters.description: Revision symbol shape as defined in swRevisionTableSymbolShape_e

parameters.name: AutoUpdateZoomCells
parameters.description: True to automatically update zone cells, false to not

returns: Revision table or null if a revision table already exists
remarks:
By default, the revision table templates are in
install_dir
\
lang
\
language
and have a filename extension of
.sldrevtbt
. The template and table must be of the same type. For example, you must specify TableTemplate with
install_dir
\lang\English\standard revision block.sldrevtbt
if you want to insert the English version of a revision block table.
